ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Applied microeconometrics.Would recommend it to any economics graduate students interested in empirical micro, because it surveys tools at the frontier of the literature.
- I think this is a very good course so all students should think about taking it.

I would definitely recommend. The course was very influential on my own research project. It is an opportunity to learn promising advanced methods in Econometrics that you could apply on your own research project. It is a very useful class. I also think it is helpful that the class address the econometric theory behind the methods. Gives you a better understanding.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It taught me new tools at the frontier of applied microeconometrics
- The course introduced us to techniques used on the frontier of the field so as such it was very useful for research work.

This course contributed a lot to my research project. I definitely intend to apply quantile regression methods as well as program evaluation methods learned on this class on my dissertation. Very useful class.
